basics.name: Axel Olafsson
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Multidisciplinary data scientist with a strong background in computer science, statistics, and psychology. Experienced in machine learning, natural language processing, reinforcement learning, and data visualization. Passionate about solving complex problems, with experience in both academic research and applied industry projects.

work.name: Iceland Ocean Cluster
work.summary: Startup Accelerator connecting the global blue economy to drive innovation.
highlights: Produce a structured, evidence-based map of current and emerging applications of artificial intelligence (AI) across blue-economy sectors.
Identify global trends, gaps, and actionable recommendations with specific relevance for Iceland and the Nordics.

work.name: BlazeSQL
work.summary: AI-powered Natural Language to SQL Data Analysis Software. Conducted error analyses, built dashboards, and automated SQL syntax error categorization using local LLMs.
highlights: Processed 2,000+ error instances across multiple database types, reducing query error rates.
Developed dashboards to track user error trends, saving hours of manual reporting.
Identified improvements in timestamp handling, reserved keywords, and database syntax variation.
Automated SQL error categorization with llama, halving manual troubleshooting time.

work.name: Vector Properties Ltd.
work.summary: Maintained financial datasets with accuracy and regulatory compliance.
highlights: Categorized and maintained financial data systematically.

certificates.name: Google Data Analysis Professional Certificate
certificates.summary: Data collection, cleaning, analysis, and visualization using SQL, R, and Tableau.

certificates.name: Data Analysis Using Excel
certificates.summary: Business-focused data analysis, including PivotTables and advanced Excel formulas.

certificates.summary: Introduction to computer science and programming using Python.
